heading.title: Create a passkey on this device

details.passkeyBenefit1Title: Sign in quickly with this device
details.passkeyBenefit1Description: You won't need to use another device's passkey next time you sign in.
details.passkeyBenefit2Title: No need to remember a password
details.passkeyBenefit2Description: With passkeys, you can use things like your fingerprint or face to login.
